Package FeatureExtractorLibrary

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFeatureExtractor
    This is an interface used to implement a class that extracts features from a dataset given as an ArrayList of Accelerometer objects or a CSV file.
    IUtil
    A class containing useful methods
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accelerometer
    Accelerometer is the class that contains the raw data collected from the sensor and is used to pass ArrayLists to the FeatureExtractor.
    Feature
    Feature is the class that contains the different feature values; besides the constructors and getters it has a generateHeader function and an overloaded toString method.
    FeatureExtractor
    This is a class with static methods meant to extract features from a dataset given as an ArrayList of Accelerometer objects or a CSV file, using the settings from Setting class.
    FeatureExtractorLibraryMainTest
    FeatureExtractorLibraryMainTest is the class I used to test the FeatureExtractor class
    Settings
    This class contains the relevant settings needed to the proper working of the FeatureExtractor; the minimum requirement involves specifying whether the FeatureExtractor uses fixed frames and the frameSize, or it uses cycles, but it can contain information regarding the input header, output header and file type and the number of steps ignored.
    Util
    A class containing useful methods
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Settings.FileType
    Specifies the type of the output file
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FeatureExtractorException
    FeatureExtractorException is a custom exception used in FeatureExtractorLibrary
